edu.ucla.wise.commons

Class Condition

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.PageItem
      • edu.ucla.wise.commons.Condition

  • public class Condition
extends PageItem
    This class is a subclass of Page_Item and represents a Precondition object on the page.

      • checkCondition

        public boolean checkCondition(UserAnswers user)
        Executes the condition check recursively.
        Parameters:
        user - User on whom the check should be performed.
        Returns:
        boolean Returns a boolean if the condition is satisfied or not.

      • checkCondition

        public boolean[] checkCondition(java.lang.String SubjectSetName,
                       java.lang.String[] SubjectSet,
                       User theUser)
        Check precondition for each member of a SubjectSet (to display stems in a question block)
        Parameters:
        SubjectSetName - Name of the subject set for which preconditions are checked.
        SubjectSet - All subject sets.
        theUser - User object on whom the checks are done.
        Returns:
        boolean Array If the check on each subject set is true or false.
